text: The Spirit is a 2008 American neo-noir superhero film, written and directed by  Frank Miller and starring Gabriel Macht, Eva Mendes, Sarah Paulson, Dan Lauria, Paz Vega, Jaime King, Scarlett Johansson, and Samuel L. Jackson. The film is based on the newspaper comic strip The Spirit, by Will Eisner, and produced by OddLot and Lionsgate Films.The Spirit was released to theaters in the United States on December 25, 2008, and on DVD and Blu-ray on April 14, 2009.
